title: Crispy potato doughnuts
ingredients: ['4 eggs, separated', '125ml cream', '3 tablespoons icing sugar', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1.25kg potatoes, peeled, finely grated and squeezed dry', '2 tablespoons raisins', '125g plain flour', '1 pinch salt', '250ml oil for deep frying', 'icing sugar for dusting']
